org.tensorframes.impl

SqlOps

Related Doc: package impl

object SqlOps extends Logging

Making and running TensorFlow based UserDefinedFunctions (UDF). Column transforms. These are not as efficient as working with full dataframes, but they may be simpler to work with.

  16. def makeUDF(udfName: String, graph: GraphDef, shapeHints: ShapeDescription, applyBlocks: Boolean, flattenStruct: Boolean): UserDefinedFunction

    Experimental: expresses a TensorFlow Row transform as a SQL-registrable UDF.

    Experimental: expresses a TensorFlow Row transform as a SQL-registrable UDF.

    This is not as efficient as doing a direct dataframe transform, and it leaks some resources after the completion of the transform. These resources may easily be be reclaimed though.

    graph

    the graph of the computation

    shapeHints

    the extra info regarding the shapes

  17. def makeUDF0(udfName: String, graph: GraphDef, shapeHints: ShapeDescription, applyBlocks: Boolean): (StructType, UserDefinedFunction)

    Experimental: expresses a Row transform as a SQL-registrable UDF.

    Experimental: expresses a Row transform as a SQL-registrable UDF.

    This is not as efficient as doing a direct dataframe transform, and it leaks some resources after the completion of the transform. These resources may easily be be reclaimed though.

    graph

    the graph of the computation

    shapeHints

    the extra info regarding the shapes
